execution_plan.description: Compute the total number of times each good (Item) was sold by counting rows in the items table; return the top 3 most-sold goods (by Item identifier).
execution_plan.query: SELECT Item AS goods_id, COUNT(*) AS sold_count FROM items GROUP BY Item ORDER BY sold_count DESC LIMIT 3;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve goods metadata (food, flavor, price) for the top 3 goods identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, food, flavor, price FROM goods WHERE id IN ($step1.goods_id);
